Package renderEngine

Class MasterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderEngine.MasterRenderer
  • public class MasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Master renderer class optimizes the rendering of many entities, renders the static, terrain and sky

      • processEntity

        public void processEntity​(Entity entity,
                          Camera camera)
        Prepares entity to be rendered, based on the TextureModel adds entity to the map. Also checks the distance from camera if the entity is visible and picks the right LOD.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to render
        camera - active camera object
